channel.title: Is It Possible?
channel.description:
Hello I like to come up with ideas and some are very easy to pull off but i'm not sure about this one, would we be able to link our client and server together and put a sort of play list in the music tab for example soulja boy and when you click on it crank that comes on? I know that it must be client side so don't even post anything saying "its impossible its client side".
Thanks ~Jvscape Owner~ As you guys post this if anyone wants to attempt this it would be greatfully appreciated
P.S. I'm new to clients so give me some slack :)

item.title: Is It Possible?
item.dc:creator: @Jvscape_owner Jvscape owner
item.description:
@Jvscape_owner wrote:

ty tele i kinda thought it was i’ll also try it but i’ll be amazed if it works for me

Read full topic

item.title: Is It Possible?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Yes, it’s possible.

It’s 100% client-side (unless you want to use frame 126 to put the text on the music tab.)

I’ll work on it

Read full topic
